website_summaries.verdict: The transparent trays in this model, offer you the chance to see how the roots of your plants are doing.
pros: While this purchase gets you 10 trays and domes
Each tray helps you get 12 plants started
The planters are a little stronger than some other brands, making them re-usable
cons: This product does not come with a tool to help you get your seedlings out of the planter, you will have to use your own

customer_reviews.title: One-Stop Place to start seeds indoors
customer_reviews.text: This has been our favorite addition to our seed-ery for our gardening! We constantly have rolling plants coming out of these. We plant 4 plant types with 3 seeds/plant and we enjoy keeping two and gifting another plant to a friend. It's enabled us to start sensitive seeds without much effort from our busy lives! Also, they definitely are reusable. We have only been recycling through our first two containers and haven't yet touched into the remaining ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I just got into gardening and am starting a bunch of things from seed, some even need to go into the fridge for a few weeks and these little boxes are perfect. I bought the 12 cell boxes and they are a great size for starter plants
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: New model is ridiculously thin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these because they were firm and sturdy. A newer model with some minor changes in design was shipped to me in my last order. The new version looks good, but it is so ridiculously thin that it bends with the weight of the soil. I am literally throwing them to the garbage since they are completely useless to me. I will buy again if this issue is fixed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Jose Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great trays for seedlings
customer_reviews.text: Picked up a bunch of these for some seedlings that I'm growing. They work great and create some great humidity for the plants. Each tray has 12 little sections and works well. Water drains into a tray below as well, so you can really get a nice setup going. The plastic thing at the top just kind of rests in place and you can turn it to decide on the level of humidity that you're after, which is cool. A little expensive, but I'm hoping to get a lot of uses over the summer for these. I'm about to start a plant jungle in my own home... wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: crappy company
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the small seed starters. good product BUT it came with a coupon for a free heat pad. when i sent in my request they replied they didn't have them anymore and hoped i'd understand. well, i don't understand. don't send a coupon if you can't back it up. horrible customer service-there are other options out there for seed starting. don't support this company.
customer_reviews.author: saraj

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being an Organic Farm (certifies) we need to check seed germination year round and being able to start the seeds in the house verses walking across several acres to our seedling houses is a blessing!!!! These little houses are (and I do not usually use this word!) @PERFECT” in so many ways!! Perfect in size. Perfect to control temp on heating pads and perfect in the overall outcome our seeds have germinated so easily in!!! Also cute to plant 4-5 varieties of herbs and give as gifts for the kitchen!!! Like I said .......PERFECT........
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Complete seed starting package
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering these and am really happy with the complete package. The sizes are perfect for seed starting and will be easy to remove as well. The tops keep moisture in yet can be adjusted to let air in as needed. One of my favorite features is the bottom drip trays so water is not leaking out over the greenhouse counters as well as being able to water the bottom for seeds that require that. I will definitely be investing in another set.
customer_reviews.author: Reader24

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, however they work great!
customer_reviews.text: The trays arrived in tact, no dents dings or crinkles. The clear trays are neat and they do have a drainage hole which is important. The pink trays are nice as well. The reason I bought these is the vented top. I like the design, twist to vent, twist to close. They are rather pricey which caused me to hesitate before buying. However, I believe the vented top will make these a winner. I will update once my seedlings get going. I recommend them as they will definitely do what they are supposed to. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for First Timers
customer_reviews.text: So let's just say I don't EXACTLY have a green thumb. I haven't planted a seed since kindergarten and this product makes is soooo easy! I love how the top has a ventilation system; it makes it so easy to regulate the environment. I planted a few things about a week ago and they're already coming up. Hint: to make everything even easier, I used soil pellets in conjunction with this system and it was so simple! Good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy, barely reusable
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine the first time I used them. However, they are made from very flimsy plastic, and quickly warped, so that the lids don't fit well, and the clear plastic cells became brittle and cracked. The size of these may suit your needs, but I'd find a heavier duty setup (maybe a full 1020 size) if you expect to actually reuse it for several seasons, or just use the biodegradable peat ones.
customer_reviews.author: Drew A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seed trays for home gardening
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to start some seeds to grow a little home garden with our kids. These come with everything needed, lid with adjustable air flow, label sticks, outer tray and inner trays. They are sturdy enough for multiple reuses. Careful removal is required when pulling seedlings but I didn’t have any issues or damage to tray. They won’t quite fit on a windowsill but we’ve been placing them next to a south facing window/door and they’ve been performance excellent. Very happy with the performance and quality.
customer_reviews.author: DIY DadTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made & not very reusable
customer_reviews.text: These trays are really flimsy. The kids don’t lock down & the inner plastic tray gets deformed just from regular heat. I had to throw away four of the inner trays so far and if you want the lid to stay of properly you have to use a rubber and. These are not even good enough for a child to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mel J Lucas

customer_reviews.title: These are fabulous.  the cells are deep and each tray is COMPLETE!
customer_reviews.text: Much lovelier and FAR handier than greenhouse flats. The cells are a bit deeper than usual, and each is about the same volume as a cell on a 72 tray. The lids are not floppy because it is fewer cells and smaller. 12 is a good number of cells for most things, and it fits on a windowsill! Easy to bottom water because you can lift the cells without hassle to add water to the trays. I will be buying more of these! These are not meant to be durable, but you could use them a few times. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: gina c.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality. Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Seller must have changed the materials. I am returning all of mine. It's very flimsy and thin plastic, should be thrown out. Seller shouldn't be selling such low quality product. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: TXHomeGrown

customer_reviews.title: well made  versital  seed starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12 cell seed starter kit. Having 10 separate trays with vented covers with 12 cells each makes it easier to use to start different seed types at different times without filling out a 36 or 72 seed tray. Just started to use them and so far they look well made and my first plantings are starting to show. Also included is an offer for a free seedling heat mat which I look forward to getting and using with this years seed plantings. Great item glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Probably will only last one season
customer_reviews.text: They are not as sturdy as I had hoped and the clear cell inserts will probably last only one time. You have to insert the plastic vents into the domes yourself and it's a little tricky. The lids do NOT seal tight to the base so just be careful when handling and if you leave them outdoors the wind will likely blow them away. I'm looking forward to being able to see the root growth with the clear cells. I thought that was a clever idea. They are small, but they fit nicely on the windowsill.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have under counter lighting of LED true daylight that dim. So this was the perfect spot for me to start my seeds. I used a heat pad and these containers. The lid helped them germinate extra fast by keeping the temperature warmer and moister. Then off came the lids as they grew tall. I also love that I can lift the plants and see the roots growing as it is a clear tray inside the green one. This helps to ensure that I water them enough to get all the roots wet.
customer_reviews.author: tst amazon

customer_reviews.title: First time using seed trays.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time for me using seed trays. I just recently installed a few raised garden beds in my backyard. It was suggested to me to start the pepper plants in trays before i transplant them outside. These trays are a thicker plastic than the thin one from the big box home improvement stores. They look like they will be easy to clean and reuse too. Now it's just figuring out what kind of vegetables I like. I didn't realize there was so much variety until I started browsing seed websites.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, and not as sturdy as other reviewers have mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Three of the trays arrived with a crack, though it is only in the top of the tray so it will not effect the functionality enough for me to bother returning them. Even if that had not happened though, I was hoping they were sturdier then they are, based on other reviews. They are not any more sturdy then similar cheaper seed trays. The good parts of these trays though are the clear cells and the humidity control. And besides them not being as sturdy as I hoped, they are well designed and well made, just not what I was hoping for given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Turner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to start Seedlings
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is working on a science fair project involving plants. I saw this and knew it would be perfect for her to use. There's actually 10 trays that each hold 12 plants so we will have more than enough spaces for her to complete her experiment and keep her plants in separate containers so as to not skew her results. The sturdiness and durability are adequate for her needs. In fact, I'm sure the trays can be reused when we need to grow seedlings for the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Wienerdogz

customer_reviews.title: Give these guys a try
customer_reviews.text: I DO really like these. The design is perfect. I like that the bottom tray is two part so you could also water from the bottom once you have seedlings. I also like that the tops are vented. They are lightweight and a little too flimsy, but not that breakable. The flimsiness caused me a couple of spills when I tried to maneuver more than one tray at a time. I believe with care they will last and be reusable for several seasons. A+ for the design and size.
customer_reviews.author: dectech

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: With all this corona stuff going around I wanted a bit of a pick me up. I bought these and all the supplies I needed before all the restrictions came about. I love how easy to use and grow! I love the humidity control on the top of the lid and the bottom tray to water from the bottom. I highly recommend at this point. I don't know how they will hold up once my plants get large enough to transfer to larger containers. I bought the pink ones since they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: So far, one star...
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, I was excited to get started. Pulled out 3 trays and planted 3 different plants. When it came time to transfer them, everything fell apart. I’ve tried wet soil and dry soil. I’d love for someone to show me how they got it to work without telling me to buy plugs. I bought these to make my plugs, not so I could spend more money chasing another product. Super bummed and thinking a return is in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Anisz

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The seed trays arrived promptly. The trays are of good quality material and appear sturdy. I have not yet used them but they appear perfect for my small green house that I set up to start seedlings inside my home. I will add more to my review as I use the trays. Update: I received a coupon with my order stating that I was eligible for a free seedling heat mat if I placed a review. The company notified me this morning (2 days I received my order) that the heat mat was no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: NDHappy

customer_reviews.title: More flimsy than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The dome top does really fit or "snap" in place like I wanted it to and the green piece on top which controls the humidity doesn't fit quite right in the hole as needed. With that in mind, I believe for the price, getting this many amount of trays (even if they are extremely thin plastic) was great and I expect them to get the job done as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Sell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and fast results!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how well these would work because they didn’t seem that advanced. They are awesome! I planted some herb seeds 4 days ago and I already have sprouts! I believe they are very helpful with allowing the greenhouse effect that each plant needs. They are very easy to use and there are enough of them to plant multiple seeds. Great for kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why so many positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: I purchased loads of planting gear this month and literally the ones in these trays are the only plants not growing! The drainage hole is horrible. Using multiple trays with different soil types I can not bottom water using these trays. The quality seems good, but I just don’t understand why every other tray product I’ve purchased works far superior and why their drainage holes work but these do not.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bass

customer_reviews.title: Cute seedling starter trays
customer_reviews.text: I like the pink color but I expected something bigger. Seems like I could get a lot of uses out of it. The name tags are a plus too, since it’s my first time using it I can’t say much more.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product is a bit sensitive to heat and will warp if exposed to higher temps than a warming pad. The company's customer service is amazing and they stand by their product! I recommend you just don't expose the trays to a hot surface (outside deck in the sun, etc) and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: RyanNoVA

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been impressed with seed plant containers until I bought these. They are perfect sizes 10 compartments to place in different locations if needed. They are made of quality thick material picking up with one hand is not an issue compared to others I bought in the past. I love that I will be able to view the progress with see thru inserts. I was so impressed with the overall quality of this product that I’ve ordered more, just to give my mother a set
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: sturdy enough and I believe it will last for several years
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit smaller than I thought, probably because I didn't read the dimensions closely. However, they are great for my hobby greenhouse because I don't need 72 tomato plants, 12 of anything I am growing is plenty. The plastic base trays are stronger than typical 2010 trays. Also, the humidity domes are a bit thicker and seem like they will last.
customer_reviews.author: S W Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've decided to plant by seed this year and spent days doing my homework for the right product. I just received this in the mail today and am very pleased with it. Well designed and sturdy enough to last for years. Can't wait to put some dirt and seeds in them. (6 stays fit nicely on one heat mat..
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Land

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Used to start petunias early and they worked very well. The adjustable vents worked terrific and the water basin at the bottom allowed me to water them from the bottom. I will be reusing them next year! To remove the plants easily from the cells, allow the soil to dry out a bit. They pop right out without crunching the cells if they’ve rooted well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sholtis

customer_reviews.title: Holes are too big.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like these and the idea of them, I was disappointed quite a few of the plastic lids had holes that were too loose to fit the air turn dial thing. Which was sort of the coolest part about these. So that’s a manufacturer’s error but considering the price, makes them less unique and more overpriced of most sets look like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these, this is my fourth year starting seeds and these are the best starters I’ve received. Super cool that you can see the roots, perfect to monitor and also to teach my kids. I also love that one set fits on one shelf of my greenhouse. Other products would waste space and I couldn’t get as many plants on one shelf. I just ordered a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Jenalea Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Seed Starting Tray
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good seed starting tray. However, it is packed very tightly, so when I tried to pry the pieces apart I got cut underneath my thumb. The edges are very sharp. But I do reccomend this tray for starting seeds. It comes with a bottom piece to put water in, the seed tray, an adjustable humidity dome, and some plant labels. Just like the description and picture. (I have strawberries and stevia that I just started!)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Madelyn Teska

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so thrilled to see this product. I love that each seedling tray is individual with 12 spaces. You get a bottom tray for excess water and top for each one. Perfect for you if you have a small space to work. I have mine on my small kitchen table and that is where I will be doing all this work. Couldn't be happier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi R. Seedberg

customer_reviews.title: Really nice seed trays
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, light enough to move around when needed and sturdy enough to hold. So far they work great for my earliest seeds. We'll see how easy they come out and go into the garden. Only downside is the lid just sits on, I sort of wish it latched better because it's very easy to knock off. Otherwise great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy assembly, high quality and good design
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size. I like having several smaller trays instead of one or two large ones. It lets me keep my different types of vegetable plants separate. I also like the vents to control humidity and the ease of assembly. They are also attractive by my window. They are high quality and very well designed. Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased and surprised at the quality of these seed trays! Yes, I know they are simple and weigh little but, given the unexpected quality of the plastic used, that is a real bonus. I am very pleased with my purchase! I have had others in the past that were so flimsy they broke when picked up out the shipping box. These didn;t require such caution. I also like humidity control disc, not that it is fancy but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these are really nice
customer_reviews.text: Like my title says, "wow, these are really nice!" is what I exclaimed as I opened the package. I'm used to the Jiffy trays from Home Depot,but I have some succulent seeds and some rare plant seeds that need different soils, humidities and water ph levels so I thought I'd try these. Looking forward to excellent results. Happy planting, everyone! :)
customer_reviews.author: HeatherS

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. My family eats a lot of pho and we used lots of herbs. I’ve been trying to grow my Thai basil from stem clippings, but they keep dying outside. These containers will be able to get my Thai basil healthy enough before replanting outside. They are to perfect size so they don’t take too much counter space.
customer_reviews.author: H. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size for my home and easy to move around when need be. The vent on top moves easily and is secure. The unit itself is not as sturdy and thick as I was imagining but they'll get the job done. I've already used one and planted my first crop. So far so good. Will update in a few weeks to see how well it's doing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for starting seedlings
customer_reviews.text: Packaged arrived quickly. I also ordered starter plugs to start tomatoes in the greenhouse. It all works very well, Already have a couple of seedlings coming up in the greenhouse. The clear inserts allow you to see the root development, and the dome and moisture control wheel work very well. So far I am very pleased with the ensemble
customer_reviews.author: jetlag

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for small indoor seed starting areas
customer_reviews.text: Measures 7-1/4" long by 5-1/2" wide (top of base) these hold 12 peat discs found on Amazon. Easy to install top vent (just push on). Lots of growing room for plants with the tall clear vented top. About 2" above expanded peat discs. Clear top fits nice over base. Will surely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apt. and don't have a lot of room, so the these little 12 packs are very handy. You get everything you need, cells, trays and dome. You're ready to go. They are light but sturdy. I'm growing succulents including cacti in mine and I have using very little room! Love 'em. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gunslinger69

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the product I need for my ground cover project!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 300 sq. ft. area that will look great with a ground cover we like. Area nurseries quoted $500 for mature plants to drop in and eventually spread to cover the area. We are DIY folks, so I looked online for a seedling starter kit. The MIXC kit is perfect. We can get enough cuttings off 4 mature plants ($20) to do the job. What I really like about the MIXC kits are their portability, the green moisture control pan, the size of the seedling trays are a perfect, fit for the cubes that hold the cuttings, and the tall clear cover has a humidity control. MIXC's kit is well thought out!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best seedling trays!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best seedling trays I have ever used! I was very hesitant to buy them having seen some of the reviews but I’m so glad I did. They are fantastic! They aren’t super flimsy, the lids fit great so no moisture is lost and I love how tight the humidity vents fit. Definitely buying lots more of these!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why these have such good reviews. I had a hard time removing my seedlings without ruining the roots. I ended up having the best luck by turning it upside down, giving the tray a jiggle, and catching them into my hand. I threw them away after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Salena Click

customer_reviews.title: Great price for just what I needed to start seeds.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is thin which is as to be expected but seems sturdy regardless. I love the plastic vents and they all fit tightly and spin smoothly. The clear inserts for the seedling plugs will be great to be able to see the root development and when to transplant. As a surprise, I also got a coupon for a free heat mat.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect system for a small gardener.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of each dome. I plant varieties but not a lot of each type. This is perfect for me and my garden. I bought a set of 6 cells for tomato and peppers. So I can have my various types in their individual domes. Just a wonderful idea for a small gardener to manage.
customer_reviews.author: JAHMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Good product - but you have to buy 10, so the cost becomes a consideration
customer_reviews.text: These are good seed starting trays and they should last through multiple uses. The vent in the dome to control humidity is a helpful feature. I really didn't need 10 of these, but you can't buy lesser quantities. I'll give the ones I don't need to my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my needs and fantastic for the price. I love that you can bottom water, that the roots are covered and that you can control the humidity. They've addressed everything with the design and I am more than pleased. Plus they're reusable! Go green!
customer_reviews.author: Chrono

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Seed Starting!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the kit is easy to assemble and user-friendly for the beginner to expert gardeners. Upon inspection, the kit is appears to be of sturdy construction and made of quality plastics. The vents you can open and close to adjust the humidity is a nice feature. The cells each have their own drainage hole, which protects your delicate seedlings from over-watering. It's nice that the kit comes with the plant labels, but expect to buy more. The cells being clear plastic allow you to check on root development. No complaints so far after one week of use. With a quality product at a reasonable price, I would definitely buy these again and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jason L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design
customer_reviews.text: Cant really comment on durability as I'm just starting to use them, but the design of the product makes them tohe attractive and functional. The pieces fit together well. The basin holds a small amount of water to keep the insert medium seed pockets moist. The vent locks in place in the lid well and provides an outlet for excess condensation. I' cant just their effectiveness as seed germination trays until I've had more experience with the product.
customer_reviews.author: D Myles Winbigler

customer_reviews.title: Well packed and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I set up a few of these... probably too soon, but I really wanted to try them out. They seem smart and useful. Half of them are already germinating away. I would recommend these for even someone who doesn't normally start seeds inside! Easy to carve out small spots for some seedlings.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and well built!!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product and from what I can see it is well built and better than what I see in the stores. I like that it has a cover included to help with germination. I love the idea of the vent to let some air ventilation going. The overall design is well thought of. I have the one with 12 slots. Plenty of space and I like that it is clear so I can see if it is rooting properly and time it right to replant. Overall I would recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Casanada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted and expected. I don't understand reviews that berate them. Nicely packaged, easily separated and fit nicely together. Perfect as starters. Look like then will be reusable also.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The clear plastic wells are a great help in determining root growth. I have been using clear plastic cocktail glasses but this system is much better with the lid. I think that the plastic could be more sturdy but with care you can definitely re-use.
customer_reviews.author: V. Arguello

customer_reviews.title: very efficient ways to start seedlings
customer_reviews.text: this is a very handy and apparently efficient design. I have already put into use for several seedlings.It does not require as much space or parts as others and is in that sense very economical. Being retired that counts. At 12 per tray times 10 that allows for 120 potential seedlings in a very small space. Just got started so we will see. My sole complaint at this time is that while the package cam with 10 bottoms and 10 trays I only received 8 tops. Hopefully that will be rectified.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kubick

customer_reviews.title: Love having ten smaller units, great value
customer_reviews.text: They are fairly small, but that works for me. The value is great. I don't need a lot of any one seedling so ten small units is perfect. Ten types of seedling can be kept separated and even if 50% don't germinate I still get enough of any one seedling.
customer_reviews.author: Line cook Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: We used these in a variety of ways. Some we used with the inserts some without others with the lid but most without. They worked well and once we took the seedlings out to transplant they all held up for reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Starter tray
customer_reviews.text: I used these trays for germinating my succulent seeds. I bought the clear ones. They serve the purpose, however I wish it was a big bigger. It is actually very small. Also the lid is flimsy and does not stay closed. I have to use plastic wrapping to create enough humidity
customer_reviews.author: Sevil A

customer_reviews.title: As Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I haven't planted my seedlings yet, I'm waiting for my brand of soil to arrive. That said, this is what I needed and what I ordered. I'll transplant to them tomorrow, but I don't see how these wouldn't deserve a decent rating. They're as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jbyrdku

customer_reviews.title: perfect for ssedlings and small clones
customer_reviews.text: they are a bit small but just perfect for seedlings and small clones and i recieved a gift code for a seedling heating mat thats so awsome thanks so much !
customer_reviews.author: Katharina Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Very thin plastic - not sure how reusable they will end up being.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is pretty flimsy, will be curious after next grow season if I can even use these again. I do like the vent - but like I said was hoping for a thicker plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: Just add soil, seeds, and water, the rest is there
customer_reviews.text: This came on time and actually seems more durable than the other ones I had. I had originally wanted the starter pack with six starter spots instead of the twelve, but with the twelve I can just start more seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The same quality and price point as others...in pink.
customer_reviews.text: I have similar seed starters in black and brown and an addition of a pink set made it very easy to see differences in types of plants in my greenhouse without trying to read tiny labels.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyReader

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I love the lids with the adjustable ventilation holes so I can tweak the humidity. I haven't transplanted any plants from this yet, but the material seems pliable enough to easily pop each little plant cell out with the roots intact without damaging the tray. If you are looking for a tray made of a firm plastic however, this is not for you. I also like that there is space between the seedling tray and the bottom tray so the plants won't sit in water and rot.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase, plant growth after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: As a first time grower, these trays turned out to be a great buy. I planted 8 different flower seeds in 8 of my 10 trays with seed starter potting soil. Three days later, my dahlias and zinnias have nothing sprouted ! These trays have been sturdy and easy to use, and obviously allow plants to grow! Time will tell for the 6 other seed types. I keep them in front of a large window that gets lots of sun. Condensation builds on the top of the plastic lid which keeps the soil moist. If I see mold starting to appear, I just open the lids and rake off the mold. So far, I would buy this product again !
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, hoping they last!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 10 pack of the 12 cell variety, used them for Rockwool and seem to be WELL worth the money so far. I don’t know the durability yet because I’ve had them less than a week SO I GABE THEM A 3 because they seem thin, which doesn’t mean it won’t hold up, but I have a feeling they are more 1-3 uses before recycling a part of them but I hope I am wrong. For what I need, these seem GREAT! They keep moisture with some maneuvering of the control and I look forward to buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Dambro

customer_reviews.title: These little Greenhouses got me back into seed sprouting!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a gardener, but have not had luck starting veggies and herbs from seeds in the house. I usually start them straight in the garden (which takes forever) or purchase plants already started. This year I decided to give these little greenhouses a try and all I can say is "WOW!" I had sprouts showing in less than 48 hours. They are great and have restored my faith in seed sprouting!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Z

customer_reviews.title: Great product, has all you need to get started!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Comes with 10 trays, 10 bases for drainage, 10 tops complete with holes for ventilation and a spinner to customize how much air comes in. Good quality as well. We started using it and were completely impressed! Our broccoli is already growing. Oh and it also comes with stick labels as well! Can’t wait to plant in all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Lots of capacity to start my seeds. Looking forward to putting them to work. Seem well made and looks like will last. I have placed my seeds in the containers and still have lot of capacity do do additional seeds. The containers are a little smaller than the ones you purchase plants in at the store but I am sure it is ample. This sure beats the method I was using before with a make shift planter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, does its job..would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the thinner plastic. That being said they are very convenient that it comes with everything you need to start your seeds. Bottom tray, some, cell tray..They are a great price and I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Its great if you have small space like me nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet smaller than i thought a little bigger it's about size of meat prep bowls. Sturdier than the black ones i got at Walmart but could be made stronger to last longer for continued reuse but we will see. Overall I'm happy to with it and can't wait to start my seeds indoors tomorrow. 120 new plants love it as I'm planning to plant a lots more veggies and flowers this year.
customer_reviews.author: Coeline Patrick-Arthurton

customer_reviews.title: To me, these are excellent quality starter trays
customer_reviews.text: I've just received my 10-Pack Seed Trays Seedling Starter Tray and have already started two trays of chiles. I like that the trays seem to be reusable, which is important to me. My first impression is that the trays are of excellent quality; they don't flex unexpectedly, they don't have sharp edges, and the components (dome, moisture spinner, enclosure) fit together nicely. I'm looking forward to using this!
customer_reviews.author: Max Power

customer_reviews.title: poor root growth
customer_reviews.text: if you want highest quality plants and root growth this wont do it.. you need like a grodan product or a real tray from a hydro store. these are not breathable at all on the bottom.. roots grew out of my root riots but died from not being able to breath.. wish it worked better
customer_reviews.author: Jason genova

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got these seed starting trays to get a jump on the growing season. The ventilation piece is very handy for when the seeds begin to sprout. The lids do not snap on, so you have to be careful when moving them around. If i need to order more, I will get these again!
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Mini Greenhouse
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I am able to vent the lids to release humidity as needed. They are small enough that I can move them around without issues. Completely recommended to anyone wanting to sprout seeds!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and very sturdy, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, extremely sturdy, and perfect for any seed starting application. They seem sturdy enough to be reused multiple times, as well. Would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Q. Tholen

customer_reviews.title: Great Seed starter set
customer_reviews.text: I will be putting soil in these tomorrow for my starter seeds. Appearance on arrival is that these are sturdy and wi work exactly as I need. I loved the little humidity adjuster.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Versitlie and a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great, our seeds sprouted in just a few days. The kids keep everything humid, and I like the adjustable vents so that we can have some control over the humidity. We bought this kit specifically because the number of cells for the price was really good, and it was split among multiple trays, which gives us the flexibility to grow different plants and put each one in a different test, where we can control their location and humidity independent of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great, does exactly what it does to do, with one minor improvement
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, and it's perfect for seed starting. It's the right size, does not leak, it's great! However the lid does not "snap" to the base, and so it's a bit annoying when you have to move the trays, with the lid moving and falling. If you pay attention to this, then it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I’m super excited about the fact that you can adjust the humidity in the tray with the vent in the top. Feels much sturdier than the brands you get at Home Depot or other stores. You get 10 trays of 12 cells, so a good amount for the price. Good quality for the price. I’ll probably reuse them next year, so I won’t need to buy more, but I’ve been encouraging friends and family to buy some and start their veggies in them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Logan Battista

customer_reviews.title: Great Seed Starter
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of seeding starters complete with a transparent cover. It is a great value and does a good job of starting seeds or clones.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Seem Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to starting some seeds. These small dome trays are pretty cool. Seem durable (reusable). Thicker plastic than some I have used in the past. I really liked the price.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Great Seed Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: Work very well for starting plants like tomatoes & broccoli inside. With the lid on, my seeds were sprouting in 4 days. There are 10 containers with 12 sections in each.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This seed starter kit is ideal for getting a jump start on the growing season. The humidity can be adjusted by the top. The cells are a great size, and have good drainage that empty into a catch tray. Simple and easy to use. I couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: teachphysics87

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The plastic is sufficiently sturdy and the dome height allows my seedlings to mature more in a properly humid and ventilated microenvironment by easily adjusting the vent wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Viola the cat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cells are NOT too flimsy the don't crush in to easily. I've used these for deflasking some orchid seedlings and they are doing really well in them. I would certainly consider buying more if I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: TonyF

customer_reviews.title: It’s mostly good...
customer_reviews.text: I like this for starting seeds and holding humidity. What I do t like is how difficult it was to get the plants out. I had to use a spoon to scoop them out.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be able to see root growth with these trays
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that the trays are clear so you can see root growth. Great for seed growing. I’ll be using these next spring.
customer_reviews.author: E.M. 3

customer_reviews.title: good trays
customer_reviews.text: these did great for seed starting last spring and they do a good job keeping things climate controlled with the vented lids
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. Decent quality. The little humidity control feature could be improved a bit. They all would not stay secured it place. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I decided to up my gardening game after I had some disappointing results trying to grow some seeds the old fashioned way. The set up and instructions were simple and I love the vented design. The humidity is just right and the growth of my seeds are going pretty well! Compared to the others, this one grabbed my attention and I’m glad I did. Just try it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for your money
customer_reviews.text: Great stability and easy to view your seedlings. They’re small enough to place several on a seedling heat mat but big enough to give the seedlings room. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Its all thin plastic like the inside cell pot. Looks very durable however it's pretty flimsy. Its not thick solid plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tony3

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have used these for two years now I sell starter plants as a hobby and a way to get a little cash to fund that hobby. These are perfect for starting seeds.
customer_reviews.author: D Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try gardening my own fruits and veggies and these work really well. Use plastic fork to scoop out the sprouts to transfer them safely. I recommend moving the containers below some roofing it rains because water can seep through the containers and drown the sprouts.
customer_reviews.author: Junghoon

product_meta.title: 10-Pack Seed Trays Seedling Starter Tray, MIXC Humidity Adjustable Plant Starter Kit with Dome and Base Greenhouse Grow Trays Mini Propagator for Seeds Growing Starting (12 Cells per Tray)
feature_bullets: KEEP AN EYE ON YOUR GROWTH: The only design in the market- High quality clear plastic trays of this seed grow kit make it easy to observe your plants without interrupting the process.
TOTAL CONTROL: Adjustable vents of this seed trays allow you to regulate the temperature and humidity of your seedling environment, so you have total control over the growing process
PERFECT SIZE FOR SEED STARTING: Size of the cells: 1.5”in Length and 1.5”in Wide, these seed trays are suitable for small seeds, such as flowers, vegetables, fruits, tobacco and other plants.
GROW HEALTH AND EFFICIENT：With drain hole at bottom of each cell for proper drainage, reduce roots oversaturating. Reusable and a great way to foster a beautiful and healthy garden.
WHAT YOU GET – MIXC Seed Starter Tray contains: 10 x Seed Tray, 10 x Watertight Base Tray, 10 x Humidity Dome, 10 x Plant Labels (A must have for seedling)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,240 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
